page.title: 13CLUBS IN TIDWORTH
page.content: Numerous clubs in Tidworth cater for a variety of interests. The garrison runs sporting activity clubs such as the Tidworth Garrison Golf Club,Polo Club,Saddle Club and Sub Aqua Club. There are many social,leisure and vocational clubs with either military, civilian or mixed membership,such as the British Legion,Clarendon Club,Red Shield Canteen,North Tidworth Country Club,NAAFI Clubs,Bingo and Whist Club, Blind Club and Computer Club. Social and leisure clubs for ladies are the Twins Club,Mothers and Toddlers,Wives Clubs and Womens Institute,the latter involves itself in a variety of local community work. Clubs for youngsters promoting indoor and outdoor activi- ties are Tidworth Garrison Youth Club, Tidworth Cub Scouts,lst Tidworth Scouts,Girl Guides and Brownies,Sea Cadet Corps and Army Cadet Force.
